storyInfo: Children who instigate, children who are cowardly. They all have gaps within their hearts and have no choice but to rely on each other. Within the possibilities, W also sees herself.

attributes.content: You're still pushing forward?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Without treatment, you're definitely getting infected.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Why would I believe a devil?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: A devil, huh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So many devils around me all the time, sometimes I forget we even have that word.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Gah, stop following us!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: I've been keeping my distance.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And stop acting nice! If you're gonna kill us, just do it already!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Ru-Rublev, you really shouldn't provoke her...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Okay. We're going then.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Ignore her.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: S-sorry!
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: I don't care if I get infected! We don't need a devil's help!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Uh huh...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: There's an abandoned hospital around here. Chernobog District Hospital.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Wanna know where it is?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Rublev...?
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Don't listen to her. She's trying to trick us.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Let's ditch her... quick.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: See that alley over there? You take that corner and I think we can get there in less than a minute!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: ——Run!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: They're fast.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: H-How did she catch up to us so quick?! Agh!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Rublev... your leg! Th-the blood is turning black...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Ugh, I could've outran her if I didn't have to save you!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Sorry...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Whatever! Just be quiet.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Don't let her find us.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Head down that street, turn left, and you'll come to a ruined plaza.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: On the west side, that big white building, that's the hospital.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The abandoned hospital.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...I think... she knows we're here...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Because you don't listen to me——fine.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Hey, devil.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Why did you tell us that?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Felt like it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: How do you two know each other?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I found him while I was out looking for food.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Rublev saved me...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: And that's why you do what he says?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No skin off my back. Whatever you want. But now it's time for you to help out your savior here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What are you gonna make him do?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Rublev...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Nothing. I told you, there's a hospital right over there.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I mean, Reunion isn't dumb, so they wouldn't waste perfectly good medical supplies... So if you wanna save your little pal Rublev, you're gonna have to steal.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's a bunch of Infected thugs over there. Thugs who murdered your family and friends.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And that's the only place they'll have the drugs that can stop the onset of Oripathy.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So go steal, rob, loot, it's all good.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Just don't expect anybody to help you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No! Don't listen to her!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: B-But...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: No?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: He knows your name, Rublev. Do you know his?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What does that have to do with anything?!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Don't go! You can't do it! There's too many——
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: I... I want to try...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Rublev isn't the only one who got hurt in the Catastrophe...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: There's so much pain... I...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Why aren't you listening to me?!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: He doesn't have to listen to you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's good that you wanna save those people.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Just keep that hospital in mind. They keep the supplies down in an underground storeroom.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You could get in through the vents in the parking garage, or through the sewers, as long as there's not too much toxic waste down there.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You could die there though.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: C'mon, your legs are shaking! You can't do it! We were dumb to even listen to a devil in the first place!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Let's get out of here!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Eeep——
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Wh-What was that?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Some things went down in Lungmen... wiped some stuff out here too.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Why wouldn't folks have their eye on a perfectly good battlefield hospital here in Chernobog?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Why do you think... a devil like me would know that hospital so well?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Because you——Umm, ah——
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: That must hurt like a bastard. I'm starting to think he's probably beyond help at this point.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If you don't act soon..
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You might just die right here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: You, ugh, what are you doing? Stay away from me!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: To go?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Or not to go?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh... but what if it's already too late, even if you did go? There's a riot going on, it might be too hard to sneak in and grab the goods——
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I-I'm going.
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: ——Yeah... you're dead.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Why are you still listening to her? I'm the one who saved you!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: But I... want to try...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: There's no way you can do it! We'll go to a drugstore, we'll find some food, that'll be enough!!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Hey... wait!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: If you knew his name, maybe you could call out and stop him? Kinda sad.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You... you tricked him! You devil!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Tricked?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I haven't told a single lie.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But hey, whether or not you believe me, that's your call.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Whether or not you believe him, that's your call too.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...I, I'm gonna go find him, nnggh...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: H-He can't do anything without me...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: You're scared he's gonna run away.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're thinking... why did he leave you alone with me? With a devil?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Am not!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Suka! A monster like you——
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Shut up.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Wait here for him. Don't move.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Or I'll kill you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Nnng——
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Who do you think I am?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm a killer.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm the killer who destroyed this city, hurt your parents and friends.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ah... haha. That's right.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I forgot you had that blade. Look, it's got a Sarkaz charm on the hilt, and it's still bloody.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Whose blood do you think it is?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: *Whimper*... I, I don't know... you made him...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Go ahead and cry. Kids can cry.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's all up to you... whether you live or die.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: He can't do it...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: You sure?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If I hadn't dug him out of those ruins, he'd already be dead...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: He needs me.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Nope... nobody needs anyone.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Nobody does.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: This ruined city got quiet again.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: There's a lot less resistance, after that slaughter. That's a good thing. Less effort. Less death.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But it's quiet over at the hospital too. Nothing moving over there, as far as I can tell.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: He... he didn't...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Maybe... he didn't actually go...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: It's been... Nng... so long...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: He ran away.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But you saved him. Wouldn't he want to save you too?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Or maybe you're strong enough to save him, but he couldn't save you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: He... He can't do anything right!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Like when we went looking for food! He couldn't even tell there was someone else in the store!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: It's all his fault my leg got——!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I... I'm going home alone...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: I already told you, you leave and you die.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But he already ran off!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I can see it in your eyes. You hate him.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: N-No I don't!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: But if... if he did go... it's been so long... he must be...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: ——Shut up.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You won't know anything until he comes back.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You can sit here thinking he's coming back, or that he's not.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But if you're thinking that he's not, if you're doubting him, hating him, that's on you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But you went right to thinking he blew it and ran off. Why?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Because you saved him? Because you're the strong one?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...*whimper*.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Waaahhh——
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: You're still strong enough to cry.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Settle down. Give it a minute and you'll be in too much pain to cry.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're young, you're not Sarkaz. So if can't take it anymore, you can tell me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'll end it for you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Wah... aahhh... waahh...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: You're losing consciousness.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ah well... guess he won't make it in time.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No... I can still...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: I'll wait... for him...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: You've got faith in him again. That's because you're scared to die.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Kids are a good judge of character. You won't get this kind of stuff out of me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But he's definitely taking way too long.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Got maybe ten minutes.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Don't worry. If it comes down to it, I'm not gonna let a kid die in pain.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...can't even whimper anymore, huh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What are you thinking?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Do you hate me? Or him?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Or maybe you hate yourself for sticking your nose where it didn't belong, saving that kid, and getting yourself hurt?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...I don't...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: You sure?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So you can still talk. Guess I misjudged you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Look, Rublev.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What do you think it is that decides what a person's gonna do?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Is it a nature or nurture thing? Where they're born, how they're born? What kind of baggage they're weighed down with?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Nah, none of that matters.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's the whole, complete, sum total of the influences on his life, all those changing thoughts and beliefs.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And just how strong he believes in those beliefs.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You saved that kid, but you didn't really trust him completely. You looked down on him, because you saw yourself as his messiah.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But him? He's easy. You saved him, he wants to save you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: When it comes to this stuff, he's stronger than you are.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Keep the blade. It's a Sarkaz blade, so I'm allowed to stand in for its owner and give it to you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Wave it around, learn to swing it, sell it for cash. Whatever. It's yours.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That's the deal.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What... are you talking about...?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: R-Rublev! Are you okay?!
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Look!
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: I did it! I stole an entire box of medical supplies! Painkillers! Bandages!
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Rublev...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Keep it... down. I'm not dead yet...
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: O-Okay. Let me bandage your wound...!
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: How do you use the bandage...? Is- is this the Oripathy medicine? I-I'll open it...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Aren't... your parents doctors?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Oh... they never taught me anything. But I'll try...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: ...You got hurt?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: I'm fine. Just a scratch... Somebody hit me with a piece of metal...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Idiot...!
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: ...Hehe...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Where's... the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Oh... I didn't see her when I came back... Did she stay with you?
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Rublev?
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: ...Say, um... What's... your name?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Oh? Err... Andrey.
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Your whole name...?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Andrey Fyodorovich Ostrovsky... heh.
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: What are you laughing at?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: You finally asked, Rublev.
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: ...Sorry.
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: N-No, you don't have to apologize...
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: All right. How do you feel?
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Better...?
attributes.name: Unyielding Child

attributes.content: Great!
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: Let's go back home. I'll help you up.
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: The grown-ups will be very happy about this box!
attributes.name: Waifish Child

attributes.content: I smiled, watching those kids.
If they were going to survive, they had to kill that seed of doubt.
You only suffer if you survive.
Like a moth to a flame, a worm in a hole.
You have to chase something, even at a cost.
Isn't that right...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Talulah?
attributes.name: W
